title: Bombay Balti
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Indian food restaurant inside a hotel, shares its space with a Chinese restaurant. Pleasant atmosphere with Indian-inspired decorations. There are few veg-friendly (especially Indian) eateries that serve alcohol in Doha - this is one. Extensive veg menu section, including channa masala, several dhal and potato dishes without dairy or egg, plus veg biriyani rice. The papadum appetizers come with different sauces and chutneys.
